EmailTemplate.subject: How ATMs can become as agile as any digital channel
EmailTemplate.textOnly: As digital takes a sledgehammer to the traditional ways of operating, the need for a digital-first approach at every self-service touchpoint is essential. NCR’s new Activate Enterprise NextGen software makes it simple to take that approach: - Simple to run, simple to use - Easily configure and install with everything you need right out of the box. - Gain a platform for innovation – No more stuck, siloed ATMs that can’t move with the market. Activate Enterprise NextGen offers agility and flexibility to support extended, digital services. - Get more eyes on your ATMs – Using modern web technology, Activate Enterprise NextGen attracts consumers to engage with an intuitive, tablet-like experience they know and love. - Cross-sell, upsell and promote with built-in marketing – Drive revenue and engagement with marketing and messaging capabilities. - Benefit from NCR’s End-to-End ATM Platform - Activate Enterprise NextGen will help transform how ATMs are owned and used, while enabling their expanded role as an access point for digital services.
